DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate eat high fat meal versus eat food affect study drug ( Nikkomycin Z ) absorb body . The second purpose gain information safety Nikkomycin Z healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Nikkomycin Z Bioavailability Under Fed Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To compare single-dose bioavailability Nikkomycin Z 500 mg ( two 250 mg capsule ) feed fast condition .
